author: mwbrooks
msg: Fixed issue #51: UIWebView Viewport Larger than Application Viewport.
Use the applicationFrame's size and the screenBounds' origin to construct a frame for the window.
This has been tested with the tab bar and it works correctly.

msg: Added postPicture method (not in official API)

msg: callback calls method on navigator.accelerometer object instead of hacky global _accel object
